pullRequest.title: Sending the full container path to the UI
pullRequest.bodyText: The Multi tree was saved with the default host container id and not with the container's id in the new site, so now it is send the container full path  to the UI, then it is send back by the UI when a Multi tree is saved

commit.message: Sending the full container path to the UI
